data.name: Through The Abyss
data.detailed_description:
• A single player adventure
  • Explore different unique environments
  • Hundreds of hand-crafted levels with hardcore challenges to unlock

Game Features:

  • Unique grapple mechanic to overcome different levels
  • Simple mechanics like jump, wall jump and wall climb
  • Discover secrets and challenges!

Note from Devs:

Hi! thanks for visiting our steampage! Take note that our game is still developing so the screenshots may not be final. Everything can change here and we will be updating it. Find out more details by checking out our social media on Twitter or Instagram.

data.short_description: Join the protagonist in his adventure through a mysterious place called the Abyss. Explore unique and tough environments with hundreds of hand crafted levels!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
